title: WTB a T207 blank back or two
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTB a T207 blank back or two
posts.post_content: Got my first one of these recently and really like it.  Would like a few more.  Looking to stay in the price range of the recorded AH sales.  Would probably go higher for significant Major League stars and cards that present very well.  Thanks!

I have a few.  Not sure what they've been going for ... But shoot me a line with an idea of sales history and we can take it from there. 

[url]Scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
i have a really nice mcgraw...but i'm kinda attached to it!
